scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ~/dev/fso/note-app-react/my-app && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ~/dev/fso/simple-web-server/
scripts.test1: git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push origin master
scripts.deploy:full: run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push origin master && run deploy
